recommendations: Anil Ujwal ‚ÄúChetan is a subtle blend of intellect and hard work. I've known him from college days and his decreasing weight and increasing might continue to amaze me! He will also bring a fresh perspective to problem solving! ‚Äù

Niladri Ganguly ‚ÄúI have known Chetann since he joined CRISIL GR&A; we have worked on a few projects together. The one thing that stands out in his approach is that he is ready to delve into anything that would lead to solving the 'issue at hand'. That apart, I have seen him grow his content skills over the years. He is definitely 'dependable' as a professional.‚Äù
